data.description: 20s classic Mono Ganyu with Chiori and Petra ZL. No Chiori burst. Snap crescent into Ganyu burst, otherwise periodic weakspots are just maintaining it.
mono cryo ganyu with double geo core. no debuff refresh needed, making it very easy to play. burst as needed on chiori, shenhe, or ganyu
Navia Zhongli Ganyu Rosaria. 17s rot. Navia swaps out earlier than usual to shorten the rot length
Wrio freeze with Ganyu, c1 combo 3N5CD, bursting every other rotation. Double swirl, 22s rotation. Jean skills at the end since team energy struggles otherwise.
ganyu rev melt with thoma as flex, kqm 20s rotation
Burn Melt Ganyu with Sucrose XL Nahida ~25 s rot. XL use Guoba only.
Neuv Furina Ganyu Kazuha. 4CA 31-32s rot. Ganyu's freeze as a defensive utility. 4EoSF on ganyu has similar result. Random delay as 9-15f swap and 2-4f action

Ganyu Shenhe Kokomi Furina. Freeze with no Anemo grouper, resulting in less reliable AoE performance but strong single target performance. Against bosses, the team drops about 10% with no substat adjustments.

Ganyu Freeze with Kazuha and Kokomi Furina. Without Venti, Ganyu's ER is not negligible, requiring a decent numebr of substats, however, this can be offset with C1. Kazuha generally absorbs Hydro, allowing to semi consistently swirl Hydro.
Ganyu Freeze with Venti and Kokomi Furina. With Venti on Fav and Ganyu catching all her particles, she can comfrotablly run 0 er. ToTM on Kokomi befores within ~600 DPS.
cough cough... Neuv Ganyu Venti Shenhe. 4CA 32s rot. Double Fav. multiple enemies for reliable fav proc.
This config provides as much buffing as possible for Ayaka using this team. (Ayaka d) -> Kazuha EPQ -> Ganyu EQ -> Kokomi E -> Ayaka d E N1 Q N1 -> Kazuha EP -> Ganyu N1 E -> Ayaka d 2N2C E d N1C
This has Ganyu on field to do more CAs, resulting in Ayaka needing more ER. Ganyu CA EQ -> Venti EQ -> Kokomi E -> Ayaka d N1 EQ N1 -> Ganyu E CA -> Venti E N1 -> Ganyu CA -> Ayaka d N1 E N1C
Fav Bow Venti allows Ayaka to run minimum ER, provided she funnels herself. Ganyu EQ -> Venti EQ -> Kokomi E -> Ayaka d N1 E N1 Q N1 -> Ganyu E -> Venti E N1 -> Ayaka d 2N2C E d N3C
Ayaka triple cryo freeze with a larger focus on Ayaka's on field DPS. Shenhe QE -> Ganyu EQ -> Kokomi E -> Ayaka d N2 E N1 Q N1 -> Shenhe E -> Ganyu E -> Ayaka d 2N2C E d N2C.
C6R5 MonoCryo Ayaka Ganyu Shenhe Kazuha, Single Rotation
C6R5 MonoCryo Ayaka Ganyu Shenhe Venti, Single Rotation

Sunfire Gany Melt with Diona as shielder. Left out certain optimizations (extra Ganyu CA and building more ER on Jean to omit her first skill cast) in interest of reliablility and useability. With said optimizations, dps increases by about 1k
Ganyu Zhongli and Passive Buffers
Ganyu Xiangling Melt with Layla and Benentt
Melt Xiangling with Rosaria and ganyu
Burn Melt ganyu with Bennett Nahida and Kazuha
Highly Unstable Burning Melt Ganyu with Zhongli
Highly Unstable Burning Melt Ganyu with Shenhe
